title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 47.3 - Purpose and intent of part (rule)
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 47.3 - Purpose and intent of part (rule)

State Regulations

It is the purpose and intent of this Part (rule) to require
reasonable and proper marking and construction of transparent glass doors and
fixed adjacent transparent glass sidelights to prevent personal injuries to all
persons frequenting any area, building or structure where such transparent
glass doors and sidelights are located. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
47.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
